message.body: Thank you for taking care of the first Friday last drop receptions!! Let me know if you need anything!
Should be good. Show looks great. Shouldn't have to be here til 11:30 a third night in a row.
Yeah, we should sit down with Greg at some point and discuss an install plan for the crane in advance, so it's not as haphazard as it was here.
What is his email, number etc?
I assumed install for crane happens second Tuesday of month- so Oct. 7th
To be ready for second Thursday reception?
Also, did the calendar work for you??
Yeah, Annie has all of that. When he gets back, I'll try to get his contact info.
Great! Thank you. And thank you for doing install since Annie ran away to vt
(For totally legit reasons, but still, thank you)
Oh wait!? Was she there!?? I see it on her Instagram now lol
She was on Wednesday, but it was a bit of a mess, too many chiefs not enough indians kind of situation.
